RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.CUSTOMER_NO

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, GFCID,SHORT_NAME, CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A'

SELECT SSI_MNEMONIC, SETTLEMENT_SEQ_NO SEQ_NO, BRANCH, PAY_ACCOUNT, RECV_ACCOUNT, COUNTERPARTY AGENT, CURRENCY FROM OLTMS_INSTR WHERE DECODE(COUNTERPARTY, 'ALL', NVL(?, ?), COUNTERPARTY) = NVL(?, ?) and branch in (GLOBAL.current_branch, 'ALL') AND DECODE(MODULE, 'AL', 'LB', MODULE) = 'LB' AND DECODE(PRODUCT_CODE, 'ALL', ?, PRODUCT_CODE) = ? AND currency in (?, '*.*') AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM olvws_PROD_ACNT_Access X WHERE (PAY_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO or RECV_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO) AND X.PRODUCT_CODE = ?)

SELECT CCY_CODE, CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN A,OLTBS_CONTRACT CC,LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY D WHERE A.CCY_CODE = DECODE(D.CCY,'*.*', A.CCY_CODE, D.CCY)AND D.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND D.CONTRACT_REF_NO = CC.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND D.VERSION_NO = CC.LATEST_VERSION_NO

SELECT ENTITY,ENTITY_NAME,ENTITY_TYPE,PHONE_NO,FAX_NO,EMAIL FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_DETAILS WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND ENTITY NOT IN (SELECT ENTITY FROM LPTMS_PARTICIPANT_ENTITIES WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO= ? AND CUSTOMER_NO = ?) MINUS SELECT A.ENTITY,B.ENTITY_NAME, B.ENTITY_TYPE,PHONE_NO,FAX_NO,EMAIL FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES A ,OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_DETAILS B WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO= ? AND A.VERSION_NO= ? AND A.CUSTOMER_NO= ? AND A.DRAWDOWN_NO=? AND A.ENTITY=B.ENTITY AND A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
